column51:
It's hard to define oneself in such a narrow space. I think we people are really complex material. But since I guess it's good I say a bit, I would define myself as someone fascinated about living and getting to know both this planet and its inhabitants. I'm interested in serving people, especially, but not exclusively, my friends. I enjoy good food and if possible better company. My interests are broad and go from traveling, literature, creative writing, philosophy and body "care" to Buddhism.  I'm pushful, curious, a bit narcissist maybe, hahaha, and I guess I tend to dream pies in the sky far too often.

I am original Catalan, from lovely Girona - Costa Brava but I've lived abroad for many long periods: Miami, Dubai, Bali and Melbourne (Australia). My live partner is a lovely aussie-greek Personal Trainer named Stelios and, together we travel the world, when not working.

I like outdoors sports and I am addicted to mountain biking. I also like snowboarding, climbing, hiking, swimming ...; I also do some mat work like yoga and Pilates (of which I am a certified Instructor). 

I read a lot, books facinate me!!

I like to go out eating with my friends from time to time, although I am most of a day-creature and at night I like my sleep. I practice ioga and meditation and have a second level on Reiki. I'm a flexitarian (meaning I eat fish but not meat) by moral reasons and I enjoy a lot good food, if possible made with organic products. Music, all kind of music - depending on the moment - is very important to me; couldn't live without it. But my main and huge passion is travelling and meeting new people, travellers like me, or locals, and learn about them and their experiences in life. 

After many yearts working for others, I am now running my my own company. It's a fresh project dedicated to giving marketing and creativity services & solutions to other companies. I am also a teacher at the University of Girona, where I teach at the Faculties of Tourism and Economics and I run an international women's project named "Grace of No Age", devoted to mature women.

I am pretty busy however I don't complain, as I do what I like.

Enjoy this spacious house in a quiet village only 10 minutes drive from Figueres and 20 minutes drive from the Costa Brava beaches

The space
The house is on a first floor. It comprises a big kitchen with dinning space, a dinning room, a living room, 4 bedrooms (one with a double bed), two bathrooms, and a little terrace. The kitchen overlooks the main square of the village with its church. There is normally plenty of parking spaces in the streets nearby the house. There is a bar and a shop next door where you can buy a bit of everything, from bread to a newspaper.

This house is situated in the very centre of a quiet village near Figueres, the Costa Brava beaches and the Pyrenees. Also close to Figueres, Girona and Barcelona, where you can enjoy day trips.
Ideal for families, artists, wirters... Quiet and inspirational.

Ordis is indeed ideal as a base for city visits, beaches and other attractions!

column51: We have both been living in Barcelona for over 30 years and we met here in our adopted home. Girona and the EmpordÃ  are part of the attraction for us and we were very happy to be able to buy our beautiful village house in 2003. We are keen cyclists and get in some Touring every year in Ireland, France, and Spain. Our other passions are wine and food and having a place near the French border has allowed us to get to know the wonders of the wines of the south of France (Languedoc Rousillon). We like to travel simply so Airbnb is a perfect solution and we have been hosting on Airbnb and elsewhere for over 10 years with great results, meeting interesting people for all over the world.

column44:

Located in the heart of S'AgarÃ³ and annexed to one of the most exclusive area in La Costa Brava: La Gavina. It combines the tranquility of a residential area with the proximity to a very fashionable center of leisure in the Coast of Gerona (Playa de Aro).

column44:
LA CASETA is an ideal combination for an enjoyable holiday, especially for those who love nature, organic food and bio-architecture.

The space
"LA CASETA ECOLÃGICA" has one bedroom with double bed, kitchen/living/dining room, bathroom with shower and a sofa-bed (2+1 people).
La Caseta is located along la CASA DE FANG which means the house of clay in Catalan. Clay is one of the basic materials we used to construct the walls, in the traditional "tapial" style used by the ancient iberians of this area. I live here together with LluÃ­s Auquer who is an architect, specialized in the construction and restoration of old houses. Our house is a haven for lovers of "bio-architecture and is not for everyone.

We are located in RupiÃ , a quaint medieval town, 12km away from the coast and the hustle and bustle. Our house is located within 7000m2 of land, consisting of the local cork tree. We grow our own fruits and vegetables in our organic garden. From the house

Hiking, biking or enjoy culture on the Costa Brava with host family.
Everything you need for an unforgettable holiday: varied walks or bike rides, detailed city walks, with or without guidance.

The space
My wife and I regularly go to our apartment in Ampuriabrava, known as the Venice of Spain on the Costa Brava. As avid hiking, cycling and culture lovers we have collected an enormous amount of information on the Costa Brava: detailed town walks, informative guides about museums and especially some 130 walks and a number of cycling trips. We have discovered over the years that the Costa Brava has much more to offer than beach and sun. That's why we started the formula host family to explore this unprecedented Spain at an affordable price.

In the bedroom are washing facilities (a sink) present.

column51:
TULUM, MEXICO: PEARL WHITE BEACHES, CENOTES AND MAYA RUINS 

After my experiences with the rental of holiday homes in Bali, we have now started a new rental project in beautiful Tulum. My family is living in Cancun and obviously we know the region very well. Together we will do everything to make your stay as pleasant as possible.

If you are looking for a destination with pearly white beaches, azure blue sea, incredibly beautiful nature and culture and lots of fun? Tulum has it all. This ancient Maya city is just a bit further south than the famous Playa del Carmen in the province of Quitana Roo (next to Yucatan) in Mexico. 
A destination that you absolutely should not miss when you are traveling in the Riviera Maya

Tulum's most well-known attractions are its ruins, cenotes & water sports, (Snorkelling and Diving). We warmly welcome you to enjoy and discover this beautiful region and immerse yourself in the relaxed atmosphere of Tulum ....

The space
Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from PalamÃ³s, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

The apartment is:

In a residential building in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, one row of houses behind the seafront. 50 meters from the beach

Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

column44:
The space
Bed & Breakfast 123ole, Can Portellâ has both the sea and mountains on its doorstep, is not far from the vibrant town of Girona, and only half an hourâs drive from the airport. Not only is it easy to get to, but Can Portell caters to everyoneâs needs.
The house is an old masia farm and dates from 1690. The main building is surrounded by a beautiful plot of land with a swimming pool, stables, trees that provide shade and an original, abandoned corral where we now keep our horses. The house comes complete with a truly unique dÃ©cor, intriguing corridors, steps, rooms aplenty and a charming veranda â the perfect spot for a morning coffee, for reading the papers and for surveying the garden. This is where you will be served breakfast, and the occasional dinner if you so desire. The shady area underneath the veranda, furnished with loungers, offers cool relaxation.
Each season here has its own charm and beauty, so our doors are open to guests all year round.

column51:
I am someone who likes very different things, you will see. Let's start: I was born in a small town in l'EmpordÃ , called Torroella de MontgrÃ­. Those were also a mixture of happy and wild times, a bit like Amarcord from Fellini (watch it if you haven't).
Then I studied computer science in Barcelona, and a PhD with a part of it in London, about medical imaging.
In between something entered my life, for good: yoga: I started practicing and soon I was so pationated then when I finished my PhD it was obvious that becoming a teaching would be the best choice of my life.
So I practice yoga every day, and also: I love music, and I play myself the accordeon and the clarinet. Just as an amateur, but the pleasure of making music is amazing. I also like dancing, folk music and lately also Lindy Hop (Girona has a few places to dance if you are into it).
I like eating well and healthy. Not to much meat (I am sorry for those creatures we kill but sometimes it comes and I eat).
I like travelling, in all wild ways, but I am not a traveller that can tell thousands things! I participate as well in the couchsurfing project, from time to time- and when there isn't already someone at my place, a friend or a friend of a friend.
The apartment I rent, Girona Riverside, was planned to be for me as another floor was ment to be the yoga studio. However now I have another, bigger, place for yoga and I rent it. I hope you like it!
As a buddhist (if I can call myself that which I don't know) my motto would be to understand the sources of suffering, and enjoy immediate happyness.
Hola!Soy David!Soy profesor de yoga y os invito a una estancia estupenda en el centro de Girona en un apartamento con unas increibles vistas al rio!Naturaleza y silencio para tu felicidad!

Alegot Mas is located at the end of a very small picturesque and quiet village, Fontclara, in the heart of the EmpordÃ , famous for its medieval stone villages like Peratallada, Pals, Palau Sator or Ullastret.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from PalamÃ³s, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

column51:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

Farmhouse of 6 rooms with private pool for up to 20 people. Mas Artigas is a traditional Catalan farmhouse been carefully renovated to offer maximum comfort and quality for the stay of our guests.

The space
Mas Artigas is a traditional Catalan farmhouse (Masia) 472m2 carefully restored, respecting the original architectural. The interior has been designed to provide the maximum comfort and quality to our guests stay.

The house can accommodate up to 18-20 people. Mas Artigas consists of a ground floor with fully equipped kitchen, spacious dining room with fireplace, cosy living room with TV and a playroom.

Decorated according to our style, we want it to have a personal, diaphanous, clean, homey and practical aspect.

The space
Beautiful waterfront home overlooking the bay and the beach.

Living room and lounge.
A large terrace with a small garden is the preferred place to enjoy great moments of rest, for lunch and dinner on the outside, to be with family or friends and to 'waste time' watching the comings and goings of the boats and of bathers.

The house is located in the bay of Sa Tuna, facing the sea. Going down the stairs, in 2 minutes you will reach the beach.

column44:
We offer you a very special place, were you will find interesting works of arquitecture and interiorism, vintage and design furniture, originals and classic re-editions, and diferent kinds of art works and objects that we have selected for their historic or artistic value. The building is located in ForÃ§a street, in the middle of the old jewish quarter of Girona and it was totally renewed in 2006. An eclectic mix that you will enjoy during your stay.

The space
The ForÃ§a street is the most special street of Gironaâs old quarter. It was the neuralgic center of the old Jewish Quarter and during the Roman period this street was part of the Via Augusta. Nowadays it is a beautiful pedestrian street located and it connects the Cathedral square with the center of the city. From this street we can visit the monumental Girona, the most important museums, eat in the best restaurants and have a drink while we enjoy a live jazz concert.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from PalamÃ³s, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

column51:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

column43: Together w familyÂ·friends in cozy apartment-lofts!
column44:
Organize a holiday reunion together with family members or friends. We have 3 apartments for an independent stay use with central-heating for 3 fam. or 13 'pers. You can apart hire an extra separate large room having a wood stove celebrating a party.

The space
Can Banal is a former Catalan farmhouse called "masÃ­a" from the XVI century. Since 1987 it has been our home and camping business. Since 2012 we have been able to open up 3 holiday apartments on the upper floor that can be rented all 3 together for a group, specially 3 or 4 families "together but not mixed". The apartments can accommodate 3 '- 5' - 6 '= 14 persons in total. Besides there is a large room, beware rather rustic style, for a party event. We rent it out apart including a simple kitchen, wood stove with firewood and music-equipment. Consult us the price.

The apartments are independent multi space rooms containing bedroom, kitchen with dining area and bathroom. All have central heating
column51:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

Nuestras profesiones son de la mÃ¡s diversa; MarÃ­a estudiÃ³ diseÃ±o de interiores y tÃ©cnicas de vidrio artÃ­stico y Stendert estudiÃ³ para ser ingeniero agrÃ³nomo tropical y mas tarde carpinterÃ­a. Probablemente esta mezcla multifacÃ©tica , nos conecta con muchos diversos intereses y actividades, en especial el mantenimiento de CB con su bosque, los animales y el agroturismo.

Esperamos ser capaces de combinar estos aspectos de nosotros y como hacer que su estancia sea lo mÃ¡s agradable y memorable como sea posible. En conjunto, se habla 7 idiomas europeos y entender algunos pocos mÃ¡s. Nos gusta mucho que decir acerca de nuestros lugares favoritos, ayudarÃ¡ a cabo el asesoramiento mÃ¡s personal y aÃ±adir si hay un evento especial ocurre.

column44:
Exclusive rental property in the historical core of Girona

The space
Located in the heart of Girona's medieval quarter, inside the original city walls and overlooking Sant DomÃ¨nec square, is the property Alemanys 5, whose original building dates from the sixteenth century.

Its recent restoration integrates old and new, with sober, clean lines that celebrate essential elements such as space, sunlight, shade, fire, stone, nature, water and silence.

The house is available to be rented as a whole unit, but it also can be divided into two independent apartments: "El Badiu" and "El Jardi".

"El Badiu" (The Veranda) is a 180 m2 duplex apartment equipped with a master suite and two junior suites, a fully equipped gourmet kitchen-dining space, spacious living room with fireplace and a spectacular sunny veranda terrace facing south, with exclusive views over the old quarter of Girona. Its capacity is up to 6 people.

column51:
French and Canadian, married to a Spanish Catalan, with 3 daughters, including 1 American, I like to travel and meet people from all countries and different walks of life.

As a host, I am flexible and understanding as long as the guest respects my property and her/his engagements.

As a guest, I appreciate a caring host and I respect her/his property and leave up to my terms of the deal.

If any life motto, mine is: "keep on growing, with an open heart".

I do quite a lot of horse back riding, skiing and scuba diving.
I have a motor bike that I ride almost daily.

On the leisure side, I like to read in English, Spanish and French. 

I have eclectic tastes in music, movie and art, ranging from Mozart to Adele, Ingmar Bergman to Steven Soderberg, Michelangelo to Bastia.

I believe it is never too late to start new things in life and I am very close to my wife and family.

column43: Charming house in Costa Brava, with swimming pool
column44:
House in a medieval town of EmpordÃ¡, Costa Brava. Close to the beaches and the best places on the Costa Brava.

The space
Charming house in a Medival Town in the Costa Brava.
Llofriu is a fantastic location in the centre of the Gold Triangle, near to beaches of Begur, Llafranc, Calella and Tamariu and only a few minutes from fabulous Golf fields.
The first reference of the town is from the X century with only 100 people living in it.
Twenty-five minutes from Girona, one hour and a half from Barcelona and 40 minutes from the French border.
The house has 200 square meters, four rooms, three bathrooms, a modern, fully equipped kitchen, a lovely garden and a swimming pool.
Exterior BBQ, bicycles.
You will stay in a beautiful place, quiet, but near to everything.

We don't rent the house in the high season for less than one week (June_ September).

column43: Catalan Farmhouse Apartment with Mountain Views
column44:
Can Cruanyes (complex of 4 private apartments with shared gardens) is a unique holiday escape, immersed in the rich culture and stunning scenery of the Spanish Pyrenees, and perfectly situated between the mountains and the exquisite beaches of the Costa Brava.

This Catalan farmhouse will be your private slice of rural bliss. We give you everything you'll need to feel at home, while still enjoying the comforts and ease of hotel-style convenience.

The space
From the ruins of the 400 year old farmhouse, three beautifully restored apartments have emerged, each retaining its own individual historic charm, while embracing some of the modern touches of interior design.

Secluded in twenty acres of peaceful woodland and paddocks, this Catalan farmhouse is a perfect destination for families and friends. The large swimming pool, play area and games garden all have views up to the imposing peaks of the mountains or down to the valley beyond.

column43: Tamariu: the most exclusive and quiet beach
column44:
Only 150 m. to the beach.
The house retains its old charm if well is fully equipped with a modern kitchen and two bathrooms.
Private access.
Terrace and patio to eat and relax.
Perfect interior temperature in Summer (air conditioning not needed)

The space
We are in the heart of Costa Brava. Tamariu is the most exclusive and quiet beach in the coast.

Tamariu is situated in a small secluded bay between the towns of Begur and Palafrugell. Small coves set amongst rugged tree-lined cliffs, crystal clear water and beautiful beaches have made the area famous the world over for its beauty. Originally a small fishing village, Tamariu has not been over developed and has retained its identity and charm.

There are some new villas and apartments on the edge of the village and like everywhere the village center and beach gets busy in August, but you will find no high rise hotels or English pubs.

Tiempo despuÃ©s vimos que por la dinÃ¡mica de la vida diaria  no podÃ­amos hacer uso de Ã©l y disfrutarlo nada mÃ¡s que en determinadas ocasiones,  y asÃ­ fue como decidimos ponerlo a disposiciÃ³n para que otras familias pudieran disfrutarlo y pasar aquÃ­  su tiempo de vacaciones, e incluso teletrabajar si este fuera su caso. 
Por eso nos  encantarÃ­a que pudieran conocer la Costa Brava desde  una perspectiva diferente, combinando el sabor de antaÃ±o, con lo actual, combinando el mar y la montaÃ±a, en un espacio para evadirse y reencontrarse con la naturaleza y con un ritmo mÃ¡s lento en su vida diaria mÃ¡s autÃ©ntico y sostenible. Pero a  la vez y cercano a lo urbano, a lugares de ocio y a las mejores playas de la costa Brava

column44:
Beautiful house with spectacular views of the bay of El Port de la Selva, on the Costa Brava, and steps away from the Natural Reserve of Cap de Creus.
Sleeps 7 people and is 5 minutes by car from the village and beaches, also reachable by foot.

(HUTG-017508)

The space
Located in the charming fishing village of El Port de la Selva, on the Costa Brava, "Giraluna" is a beautiful rustic-style villa with lots of character. It is situated among pine trees on the top of a hillside and enjoys spectacular views over the village, the bay and the mountains. The location is very tranquil, just 30 meters from the entrance to the protected reserve of the Natural Park of Cap de Creus, though very close to the centre of the village and the beaches, easily accessible by car and on foot.

"Giraluna" has a capacity for seven people distributed between 3 double bedrooms with their respective bathrooms, two with panoramic views. The kitchen is well equipped
column51: Hi! I'm Mercedes, from Barcelona, although I have been living in London for quite a while. I love the Mediterranean and its fantastic mix of sunshine, sea, culture and lifestyle. column51:
Â¡Hola, bienvenidos a nuestro perfil en Airbnb!

Nos hemos decidido a alquilar nuestra casa en Lloret de Mar, porque no la usamos lo suficiente, y dado que nos encanta viajar y apreciamos las numerosas oportunidades que ofrece el portal Airbnb, nosotros tambiÃ©n lo utilizamos como huÃ©spedes, nos gustarÃ­a poder ofrecer a los demÃ¡s viajeros que conozcan esta bonita zona de la Costa Brava: ciudades costeras tan famosas como Lloret de Mar (5 min. en coche), que te ofrece un sinfÃ­n de posibilidades de diversiÃ³n y buena comida, la ciudad medieval de Tossa de Mar (15 min. en coche), con su famoso castillo, o Blanes (15 minutos en coche) con sus famosas fiestas con fuegos artificiales. Nuestra casa estÃ¡ rodeada de muchas e increÃ­bles playas como Canyelles, o la playa LlevadÃ³, sin olvidar la playa de Santa Cristina, por citar algunos ejemplos. 

Nuestro deseo es que te sientas como en tu propia casa, y por eso hemos pensado en ofrecerte todo lo necesario para una estancia cÃ³moda, lo mÃ¡s acogedora posible y que te lleves un bonito recuerdo. En nuestra casa encontrarÃ¡s el relax y la tranquilidad que estÃ¡s buscando, y podrÃ¡s refrescarte en los dÃ­as de calor en la maravillosa piscina de la urbanizaciÃ³n. Estamos siempre a tu disposiciÃ³n para cualquier consulta, incidencia o sugerencia que surja durante tu viaje y estancia. AdemÃ¡s, nos encantarÃ¡ ofrecerte recomendaciones e ideas sobre cÃ³mo pasÃ¡rtelo bien. 

Un abrazo, Ady y David

Can Gat Vell is very well communicated, at only 2 km from motorway AP7. Best beaches of the Costa Brava at 17 km. At less than 30 km, we have Girona, Figueres. The volcans region of La Garrotxa is at only 46 km. Border with France at 35 mn.
Properties have areas to be shared in order to enjoy the family and the peacefulness. Swimming pool, garden, barbecue, covered terrace. Inside space

column43: Els Racons del Fort: Castle in wine territory
column44:
A stone building from 1694 having a shape of a fortified castle in the village of Capmany only 14 minutes away from Figueres and 26 minutes from Roses.

The fortified construction has a big garden, two terraces, and a covered outdoor space with a pergola. Swimming pool will be ready April 2022.

Capmany has more than ten wineries and your host Yves can teach you about local cuisine in form of: private dinners, hands-on cooking classes, or local experiences visiting wineries and food producers.

The space
The house offers a very unique feeling of the history that has happened inside and outside its walls. It has been renovated in a very respectful way and host Eli has decorated the house to make you feel good during your stay.

For family gatherings, it is possible to rent the apartments too and come together in the garden and pool.

There is also a huge diaphanous space very suitable for diverse activities such as retreats

What I love most about my place is the location, out of the ordinary and  literally steps away from supermarkets, restaurants, and the most beautiful beaches anywhere in Spain.

Bizcochos con diferentes sabores, mermeladas, cereales, pan reciÃ©n hecho y embutidos de la zona, una de las mejores del paÃ­s en esta especialidad.

Mas Torrencito se puede disfrutar en pareja si te gustan los animales, ya que es una manera de poder disfrutar de su compaÃ±Ã­a siempre que quieras. The space
This apartment is located in Costa Brava, Playa de Aro in Spain and it's situated on the 2nd floor of the building. It is very conveniently located only 50 metres from the beach.

It offers a fully equipped kitchen, living/dining room, 2 bedrooms, and balcony. The kitchen has a microwave, oven, stove and dishwasher, plus a freezer, coffee maker and washing machine. All the apartment have wi fi internet and ACC cold and heat.
Towels and bedding are also included for your convenince. The excellent beach is easily accessible by foot where you can enjoy long walks along the seashore. There are a many good restaurants, bars and other entertaining activities in the vicinity. A parking space is also available near the building.

The coastal resort of Calella de Palafrugell is only a 30 minute drive and the Barcelona airport is an hour drive. Furthermore, the Girona Airport it is about a 40 minutes drive in car. The hotel is 800 meters from a golf
column51:
Hello!!
 
My name is Javier, and although I'm originally from Girona, I've been living in Barcelona for the past 25 years, so I know the city and its surroundings quite well.
 
Traveling is one of my favourites hobbies. I love getting to know different cultures and people from around the world. I had the chance to visit many countries, either for fun or for professional reasons, since my last job was as a publisher for trade magazines.
 
I started the business of rental apartments âThe Vintage Rentalsâ  because as a tourist, I lived first hand the benefits of living a local experience wherever I go, and I know other people search the same type of authentic vacations. This is how I got into the this business and now I have apartments in the best areas of Barcelona with all the necessary facilities for an affordable price.
 
I invite you to come and discover a different and unique experience of Barcelona and all its beautiful locations and sites!
 
For further details, do not hesitate to contact me.
 
Javier
The Vintage Rentals

column43: LA CASA NOVA - Mas with much comfort
column44:
The space
The house is a detached stone house near the village PontÃ³s. The farmhouse is situated at 145m altitude and offers a beautiful view out over the valley towards the sea to the east and south. To the north and west, you got the view of the Pyrenees Mountains and its foothills. It is just 20 minutes drive away from the spectacular beaches and coves of the Costa Brava, 15 km from the towns of Figueres where the Dali Museum is situated, from Banyoles with its large lake, and 25 km from Girona with its very attractive old town. Barcelona is situated 130 km south and by car, but also by train, well and quickly accessible.

The farmhouse was built in 1640 on the site of a former Iberian settlement. The house is detached and surrounded by fields and forest. The nature begins thus directly outside the front door. This is a 200 year-old historic house rehabilitated by a local architect in the center of medieval town Besalu (Girona), with peaceful garden where to disconnect from the world. County of Garrotxa, a remarkable region plenty of outdoor options.

The space
House is suitable for two families (max capacity is eight), with a private garden and a small natural pool (no chemical depurator). Walking distance from main facilities (supermarket, bakery, press, etc.). Situated in the inner center of old town. Restricted access to cars.

Guest access
Three-level house with private garden. Small natural pool (in the garden). House is fully equipped for self-catering and has washing machine too.

Other things to note
Visit the official Website of Besalu and of the Garrotxa region to learn more about what to do; it's amazing!

We are Ana and KristjÃ n and weâve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Letâs Holidays.

The passion with which weâve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you.

column43: Just us 2, in a cozy apartment in the mountains!
column44:
in English...

Can Banal is a 16th century catalan farm house locally called masia that has been restored into three independent livings. During the summer we run a camp-site on the terraces below the main house.

The Green Apartment...
Â· Is a 20 m2 room with no balcony. There is a common outside space one floor below.
Â· Suitable for a couple and eventually a baby or a small child.
Â· Double bed (160cm) and private bath room.
Â· Kitchenette suitable for breakfasts and/or a simple meal preparation. With fridge, microwave and kitchen utensils.
Â· Central heating and tv&wifi. All the facilities for an own supported stay (sheets, towels, kitchen-tools, household items).
Â· The entrance to the house will be shared with us.

The landscape around Can Banal is in a rural and peacful environment with rivers and forests that changes colors depending on the season. In autumn there are varieties of mushrooms and in spring many types of orqu
column51:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

  WelcomeÂ·BienvenidosÂ·WelkomÂ·BenvingutsÂ·VÃ¤lmommenÂ·BienvenueÂ·Willkommen

Hola somos Maria and Stendert

Vivimos en Mas Can Banal desde hace muchos aÃ±os. Stendert, nacido '51, originario de Breda , Holanda y MarÃ­a, nacida '66, de Estocolmo- Suecia , donde sus padres una vez llegaron desde EspaÃ±a . Nos gusta mucho vivir aquÃ­ en el campo, rodeado de colinas, bosques y rÃ­os. A mitad de camino hacia el mar y la mitad del camino a las altas montaÃ±as.

Nos acompaÃ±a nuestra hija Saskia, nacida '02 y Luuk, hijo de Stendert,  nacido en el '93, que trabaja en nuestro pueblo. Ambos en sus ratos libres nos ayudan en diferentes tareas.

Nuestras profesiones son de la mÃ¡s diversa; MarÃ­a estudiÃ³ diseÃ±o de interiores y tÃ©cnicas de vidrio artÃ­stico y Stendert estudiÃ³ para ser ingeniero agrÃ³nomo tropical y mas tarde carpinterÃ­a. Probablemente esta mezcla multifacÃ©tica , nos conecta con muchos diversos intereses y actividades, en especial el mantenimiento de CB con su bosque, los animales y el agroturismo.

Esperamos ser capaces de combinar estos aspectos de nosotros y como hacer que su estancia sea lo mÃ¡s agradable y memorable como sea posible. En conjunto, se habla 7 idiomas europeos y entender algunos pocos mÃ¡s. Nos gusta mucho que decir acerca de nuestros lugares favoritos, ayudarÃ¡ a cabo el asesoramiento mÃ¡s personal y aÃ±adir si hay un evento especial ocurre.

column43: Space Oasis - a tranquil and stylish retreat.
column44:
Space Oasis is your haven of peace and quiet just a stones throw away from the beautiful beaches and bustling towns of the fabulous Costa Brava - a truly welcoming escape for friends & family to settle back, relax and unwind - hammock in the garden, a dip in the pool, fire pit BBQ, dinner & drinks on the terrace and total privacy as the space is all yours. Bliss!

The space
Space Oasis Holiday Villa is the perfect destination for groups of up to 12 people looking for somewhere a little bit special. We had a lot of fun creating the 'Pop Art' guest accommodation and love sharing our distinctive home with appreciative and laid-back friends from all over the globe.

Our living spaces are split into sections all accessible from a large central courtyard with 100 m2 terrace & 10 x 5 m swimming pool. The main guest house has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a lovely spacious open plan kitchen/diner/living area with a wall of glass doors opening out to the terrace
column51:
Welcome to our Space Oasis! My name is Amalia, I am English/Canadian and my husband Dani is Russian. We met here on the Costa Brava, have lived here for almost 15 years. We speak EspanglishRuss together!

I work from home whereas Dani manages a super yacht in Barcelona and is often out 'at sea'. We both enjoy travelling and finding adventure when we can doing outdoorsy stuff like motorbiking or cycling; on-and-off road, horse riding and long dog hikes, but more often than not we're both working or relaxing in the garden at home. Well, to be honest, usually Dani is doing the gardening whilst I practise juggling, hula hoop, poi - or whatever is the latest skill I'm learning off YouTube!
 I'm a passionate animal lover and have 2 dogs, 8 cats and 1 horse. When I'm relaxing I love to just hang out with my animals and read a book. Guests have full access to my large library of books. Quite a few are beach-read best sellers - perfect for holidaymakers.

As we are often out-and-about our good friend Amber Jane will help you with  enquiries and bookings in the first instance and I will meet you when you arrive at Space Oasis Holiday Villa.

I will be here to help you get settled in but once I give you the keys my house is yours to enjoy in your own way. 

I like to share my house with good people , all I ask is that you respect my belongings and we both respect each others privacy. Other than that: 
Eat, Drink, Swim and Make Merry!

The space
The house, which opened in 2010, is built on one of the last available sites in the old town of Begur, is 5 minutes from downtown and at the same time enjoying 600m2 of land equipped with porch, lawn and pool perfectly oriented to the Mediterranean. The house style is a blend of contemporary lines solved with technology and materials. Environmentally friendly, using organic materials, and home automation systems to ensure maximum comfort. It features a bedroom suite with Jacuzzi tub and shower room with a big window facing the Mediterranean. Two rooms with shared bathroom also overlooking the sea and the castle. And fourth room free to the main body of the house with a window looking at the bottom of the pool. The kitchen dining room is set in a single room under a massive dome-shaped cover Catalan. You can park up to 3 cars. Fully exposed to the sun.

column43: Family 5, cozy & independent stay in the mountains
column44:
Can Banal Rural is a 16th century catalan farm house locally called masia that has been restored into three independent livings. During the summer we run a camp-site on the terraces below the main house.

The Yellow Apartment
It is a cosy 40 m2 multi-space apartment with bed & bath-room, own kitchen & dining.
Beautiful views and tranquility.
Fits for couples as well for families.
Equipped with a double bed (160cm) and 3 bed places more, up in a loft compartment, suitable from around 5 up to15 years of age. Smaller children might sleep down in an adding bed or with their parents.
Central heating, tv&wifi, gas stove, micro-wave, fridge, extractor and a small balcony.
There are all the facilities for an own supported stay (sheets, towels, kitchen-tools, household items).
The entrance to the house will be shared with us.

The landscape around Can Banal is amazing, with rivers and forests that changes colors depending on the season.
column51:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

At Masia d'Els Plans we are as respectful of the environment as possible. The farmhouse has been restored maintaining the structure of the original building,.

The farmhouse has four rooms with four beds in each room and a bathroom inside each one.
The entire house and its surroundings are rented to a single group, it is not shared with other groups of people.
It is a perfect place to organize meetings of family and friends groups.

There is a game's room with table tennis and table football. Board games and children's boooks.

column43: El Serradell West - Your cottage in Alta Garrotxa
column44:
El Serradell is an old "masia" (Catalan country house) which has been divided into two 2-storey appartments for 4/ 6 PAX each.
El Serradell is located in a magnificent remote outdoor setting, on a large estate with spectacular views overlooking the Catalan Pyrenees and the Garrotxa to the south. The house is 2hrs away from Barcelona, 1hr away from Girona, Figueres and the French border.
Access through 12km of forest road in good condition, you'll have to drive slowly.

The space
Typical "masia", or Catalan country house, dating back to the 10th century, but totally renovated in style and comfort.
This is your place if you are looking for nature, quiet and the best comfort.
The house is totally disconnected from the grid, and uses solar power and biomass for electricity and heating. Water supply from the nearby spring.

Guest access
Each appartment has an independent entrance and independent outdoor areas. The only shared

column44:
MAS TORROELLA is a superbly restored Catalan farmhouse dating from the 14th Century. A large and roomy property both inside and out, the house radiates unassuming grandeur and luxury yet has all the home comforts, mod-cons and facilities such as its own spa, sauna, gym, tennis court and outdoor swimming pool.

The space
Thanks to its excellent location, guests can disconnect and enjoy complete privacy and seclusion at Mas Torroella which is set amid protected pine and cork forests. Yet just a short drive away, you find rustic villages dotted along the coast and inland where you can discover the essence, the character and gastronomy of this romantic region.

Mas TorroellaÂ´s scrupulous restoration highlights some amazing details such as Baroque style hand-painted ceiling friezes, traditional stone windows and rustic stone walls. These features combine with grace and luxurious finishing touches to give a lasting unique, magical feeling the moment you step f
column51:
Mas Torroella was built in the XIV century. When my father bought it in 1989 it was an abandoned stone ruin crying to be loved and cared for by somebody... And he spent most of his life rebuilding it, investing all his love and passion to create his dream. When my father passed away, my husband and I decided to fulfill his dream and complete the restoration... now our historic masia has been turned into a charming luxury villa & spa.
Most of our guests agree that you can feel peace, tranquility and love inside and outside our house. We are proud of it and must admit that, after a long and hard period of restoration, it has been worthwhile.
We have really put lots of effort and lots of love in restoring it... and I hope this can be seen in the result...

I am sure the Villa will be up to your standards and that you will be able to enjoy the holiday you have wished for, here with us in the Costa Brava.
We will do our best to make it happen!

Our house is a lovely retreat in a country setting, from which you can plan the most wonderful day-trips in Catalonia: going to swim to the neighboring beaches, or visiting the Roman ruins of Empuries, and even spending a whole day in Girona or in Barcelona. The house offers a beautiful private garden with a swimming pool and wonderful views.
It is an ideal place to spend the holidays for families with children, and specially with kids up to 16 years old.

The house is fully equipped to enjoy a comfortable accommodation. Includes linens and bath towels. It also has a maintenance service for the garden and the pool.

Around Llampaies you can do all kind of outdoor activities: cycling, horse riding, tennis, golf, diving, windsurfing. From the house you can take nice walks in the countryside.

column51:
Hola, we are Stendert & Maria

We live in Mas Can Banal for many years. Stendert, born '51, originally is from Breda-Holland, and Maria, born '66, is from Stockholm-Sweden, where her parents once had arrived from Spain. We enjoy very much living here in the countryside surrounded by hills, forests, and rivers. Halfway to the sea and to the high mountains.

We are accompanied by our daughter Saskia born '02 and Stendert's son - Luuk, born  '93, who works in our village and in their spare time help us.

Our professions are of the most diverse; Maria studied interior design and artistic glass techniques and Stendert studied to become a tropical agronomist and later carpentry. Probably this multifaceted mixture connects us with many diverse interests and activities, especially the maintenance of CB with its forest, animals, and agro-tourism.

We hope to be able to combine these aspects of us and make your stay as pleasant and memorable as possible. Together, we speak 7 European languages and understand a few more. We like very much to tell you about our favorite places, help you out for more personal advice and add if there is a special event going on.

  WelcomeÂ·BienvenidosÂ·WelkomÂ·BenvingutsÂ·VÃ¤lmommenÂ·BienvenueÂ·Willkommen

Nos gusta mucho vivir aquÃ­ en el campo, rodeado de colinas, bosques y rÃ­os. A mitad de camino hacia el mar y la mitad del camino a las altas montaÃ±as.

Nos acompaÃ±a nuestra hija Saskia, nacida '02 y Luuk, hijo de Stendert,  nacido en el '93, que trabaja en nuestro pueblo. Ambos en sus ratos libres nos ayudan en diferentes tareas.

Nuestras profesiones son de la mÃ¡s diversa; MarÃ­a estudiÃ³ diseÃ±o de interiores y tÃ©cnicas de vidrio artÃ­stico y Stendert estudiÃ³ para ser ingeniero agrÃ³nomo tropical y mas tarde carpinterÃ­a. Probablemente esta mezcla multifacÃ©tica , nos conecta con muchos diversos intereses y actividades, en especial el mantenimiento de CB con su bosque, los animales y el agroturismo.

Esperamos ser capaces de combinar estos aspectos de nosotros y como hacer que su estancia sea lo mÃ¡s agradable y memorable como sea posible. En conjunto, se habla 7 idiomas europeos y entender algunos pocos mÃ¡s. Nos gusta mucho que decir acerca de nuestros lugares favoritos, ayudarÃ¡ a cabo el asesoramiento mÃ¡s personal y aÃ±adir si hay un evento especial ocurre.

Can Cruanyes (complex of 4 apartments with shared gardens) is a unique holiday escape, immersed in the rich culture and stunning scenery of the Spanish Pyrenees, and perfectly situated between the mountains and the exquisite beaches of the Costa Brava.

The space
From the ruins of the 400 year old farmhouse, three beautifully restored apartments have emerged each retaining its own individual historic charm while embracing some of the modern touches of interior design.

Can Cruanyes (Alzina) is a unique holiday escape, immersed in the rich culture and stunning scenery of the Spanish Pyrenees, and perfectly situated between the mountains and the exquisite beaches of the Costa Brava.

The vaulted ceilings and original window frames are reminders of the farmhouse as it once was, while the large window into the open plan kitchen/livingroom gives a lovely vantage point onto the adjacent woodland of holm oak, pine and hackberry trees.

-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

column43: BEGUR. Country house in Costa Brava
column44:
Restored house from 1.870 in the center of Begur one of the most beatiful villages in Costa Brava.

The space
The house was an old little factory to produce corks for wine bottles. It was refurbished as a summer residence for our family and friends.
We kept all the old elements from the past, old Catalonian ceiling, wooden doors, and old tile floors, opening big windows to make the place special and full of sun and light.
We love cooking, so the kitchen is perhaps bigger than normal, with all the equipment to prepare fresh food just bought in the local farmers.
It has a little garden of about 25m2. A special place to relax under the shadow of a jacaranda tree which gives flowers once a year (in June).

Guest access
The house was fully prepared as a summer residence 4 years ago. You will find 3 double rooms with two double beds and a double bunk. One of the rooms 100% independent on the lower floor close to the garden like a
column51:
...Life is short so I feel I need time to enjoy it as much as possible: lot of energy and creativity, the best friend of my friends, and a father 100% love.
Thus our house is always plenty of good friends who likes enjoying the good life that Costa Brava offers us, love wine, cooking, running  and staying on the beach till the sun goes down everyday.

Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from PalamÃ³s, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

column51:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

column44:
No two rooms in our house are alike.
In The Hayloft, with its soaring beams, you could imagine yourself in a medieval barn. This room has its own bathroom.
The Gypsy Woman does full justice to its name. Ideal in combination with The Blue Mirror because of the spacious living/library and bathroom they share.
The Green Pleasure is a romantic space for two, with an en suite bathroom (with tub).
The Conservatroy is the only room with its own entrance, and has an en suite bathroom.

column44:
Free internet in newly renovated apartment, 65 m2 - 5th floor just opposite the hotel Panorama. there are 2 bedrooms and in the living room possibility of 2 extra sleeping places. Sea view from the balcony and just cross the street to the beach .

The space
Quite new with modern, luxury furniture, beds with the best madrases and possibility to place your luggage in the space under the madrases. Quite new dishwasher, wash-machine, induction plates, oven, microwave, hairdrier, TV etc.

Guest access
Big swimming pool (Open June - September incl.) Tennis court. Private parking place just at the apartment, which are close to shops, restaurants and the harbour with a lot of possibilities during the holidays i.e. diving. Excellent for families with children. (A lot of playing grounds). Large nature area with a lot of wandering and bicycling paths

Other things to note
In August we only rent out for whole weeks
Saturda
column51: We are a married couple for more than 40 years, we have 3 children and 11 grand children - and we are retired. In September 2013 we bought the apartment and got it totally renovated, Everything in the apartment are quite new. We like to travel around in Europe, and we intend to stay in the apartment during the winter. We have our permanent residence in Denmark where we intend to stay in the summer.

column51:
NIÃOS, PERROS Y CINTAS DE VÃDEO

Mas Torrencito es una casa rural diferente. Una masÃ­a del siglo XV, restaurada con un estilo muy personal, y rodeada de campos, bosques y caminos que llegan hasta un rÃ­o que merece ser escuchado al menos durante un rato. Su propietario, Miguel, se ha encargado de darle su propia personalidad a la casa durante siete aÃ±os, creando diferentes rincones en los que puedes charlar con tu pareja disfrutando de una buena botella de vino mientras tus hijos juegan libremente por los alrededores, compartir con otros huÃ©spedes costumbres y (Website hidden by Airbnb) de tus mascotas mientras ves cÃ³mo ellas disfrutan y se persiguen felices, o subir a la planta de arriba y escoger una de esas pelÃ­culas que tenÃ­as pendiente para hacerte un homenaje frente a una gran pantalla. Puedes hacer lo que quieras, porque en Mas Torrencito la libertad se respira a cada momento y en cada lugar.

Marcos, Manuela y MatÃ­as, tres de las mascotas de Miguel, son el autÃ©ntico espÃ­ritu de la casa. Esos tres perros deberÃ­an tener contrato indefinido y pensiÃ³n vitalicia. Ellos muestran la casa a los nuevos huÃ©spedes, sus 8 confortables habitaciones dobles y triples, los baÃ±os completos, el salÃ³n de techos altos y vigas de madera, el antiguo horno de pan, la sala de entretenimientos, la piscina y el jardÃ­n con mobiliario y juegos para niÃ±os. Pero tambiÃ©n acompaÃ±an a los huÃ©spedes durante los paseos, entretienen a mayores y niÃ±os con su buen carÃ¡cter y sus ganas de jugar, y relacionan con las mascotas reciÃ©n llegadas con paciencia, cariÃ±o y una gran amabilidad.

Mientras tanto, Miguel cocina. Y cÃ³mo cocina. Platos elaborados con productos de su propia huerta. Recetas que le chivan las madres de los propietarios de los restaurantes de los alrededores. Bizcochos con diferentes sabores, mermeladas, cereales, pan reciÃ©n hecho y embutidos de la zona, una de las mejores del paÃ­s en esta especialidad.

Mas Torrencito se puede disfrutar en pareja si te gustan los animales, ya que es una manera de poder disfrutar de su compaÃ±Ã­a siempre que quieras. TambiÃ©n es un lugar ideal para niÃ±os, ya que rÃ¡pidamente se enamorarÃ¡n de Marcos, Matias y Manuela, probablemente la mejor buscadora de piedras del mundo. Y tambiÃ©n es un lugar perfecto para visitar con tu propia mascota, disfrutar de unos dÃ­as en la naturaleza y que los dos hagÃ¡is buenos amigos. En Mas Torrencito te sientes parte de algo, y cada visita es diferente a las demÃ¡s.

El Ãºnico problema de Mas Torrencito es que obliga a volver. Yo ya lo he hecho, y no serÃ¡ la Ãºnica vez.

We are Ana and KristjÃ n and weâve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Letâs Holidays.

The passion with which weâve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you. 
Thatâs where our philosophy comes from. We like to chat and we will try to get you anything that you need and find solutions to anything that you propose.

At the end, holidays should be exactly the way we want them, right?

The Home Selector is the person who will help you choose the option most appropriate to your tastes. You will save time in searching and finding the best choice.

Letâs Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.

1 bathroom, 2 terraces. Spacious and light, this apartment has everything you need to make your holiday comfortable. Situated in a quieter part of the medieval village Peratallada.

The space
Spacious and light, this apartment has everything you need to make your holiday comfortable. Situated In a quieter part of a small but famous medieval village, offering lots of restaurants and bars within easy walking distance.
Consisting of a en-suite bathroom,large double bedroom which leads to outside terrace. Large open plan living room and dining area with access to terrace. There is an extra GEM of a roof terrace. kitchen is fully and tastefully equipped.
This apartment has everything you need to savour
wonderful memories.


Beaches, golf: Many wonderful beaches can be reached within 10-20 min depending on your choice. 4 golf courses within easy reach. Definite
column51:
I am from Austria and have lived in various different countries.
My first home is switzerland and my second home is in Spain in Peratallada, near the beach.
I love cooking , reading, sports, walking with my lovely labrador dog, my home, family and friends.
I enjoy meeting people of all nationalities and I love to share a glass of wine with them whilst telling them about  this lovely area.

column44:
Single room in PedrÃ³ neighborhood, the old town of Palamos. One block from the harbor and 20 meters from the main street of the village. Charming fishing village of 22,000 inhabitants on the Costa Brava.

The space
Among one of the most charming ports of Costa Brava and the most pristine beaches in the area. About four streets is the lighthouse of the town, from which you can see the race boats at 6:45 a.m. in the morning : a beautiful sight of the open sea can enjoy a few minutes before sunrise.
The best way to see the beaches and coves of the area is the coastal path linking Palamos with other locations: an idyllic walk hard to forget.

Guest access
On the floor you have the option of tasting the most typical dishes of the area at a great price , prepared by an excellent chef specializing in Mediterranean cuisine.

column43: House with garden in front of Sea
column44:
Beautifull and sunny house with garden in Cadaques in the Caials Ã¡rea, in front of the beach in "Caials" and 20 min walking from Cadaques centre. Close to Hotel Sol i Xent.
Perfect for families !!!

The space
Perfect house for a family with kids.
Completely newly equipped, very luminous and comfortable.

The house has two floors; on the ground floor there is the living room with access to the garden , the kitchen also with access to the garden and a big bathroom.

On the first floor there are three double bedrooms with two bathrooms.

There is one parking space in a covered parking.

The neighbourhood is very nice and quite, perfect for a relaxing holiday.

The Caials beach is underneath the house and it is at 7 minutes walking distance from El Ros beach, and 20 minutes from the centre village.

Guest access
We have 4 bikes for the guests.

column43: close the beach - medieval village Pertallada
column44:
This charming, stylishly renovated 1st floor apartment is in a typical beautiful 100 year old building.
It has a very pretty patio with beautiful views,
great for a wonderful bottle of wine or dinner.

The space
Spacious, bright 1st floor apartment built in 18th century stone and set in glorious surroundings. Consisting of an open-plan kitchen and living area leading to a charming outdoor patio.
The property is in the quieter part of a small but famous, medieval village offering plenty of restaurants & bars all within walking distance
.
The apartment consists of one big double bedroom ensuite, bathroom with shower and washbasin and a separate WC. There is a double sofabed in the lounge area.
Outdoor breakfast/dining on patio is possible. There are comfortable deck chairs, parasol and candle lanterns.
Central heating for the colder months is available and charged separately at cost price.
The kitchen is equipped with hob/
column51:
I am from Austria and have lived in various different countries.
My first home is switzerland and my second home is in Spain in Peratallada, near the beach.
I love cooking , reading, sports, walking with my lovely labrador dog, my home, family and friends.
I enjoy meeting people of all nationalities and I love to share a glass of wine with them whilst telling them about  this lovely area.

column43: Private villa with pool & sea view for families
column44:
Villa with great sea views overlooking the valley of Palamos and St Antoni de Calonge. We accept families and guests 30+.
Top floor: kitchen, living room, WC, roof terrace and small balcony.
Lower floor: 4 bedrooms w/ double beds - two new bathrooms.
Large terraced garden with pergola and generous pool area.

Quote from previous guest: "French riviera meets vintage Hollywood Hills."

The space
Villa Mariposa is very private - set on the end of the street Carrer Om in the urbanization of Rio de Oro - located on the hillside of Calonge. The house offers a spectacular view over the valley of Calonge and bay of St Antoni de Calonge/Palamos.

The house have a large landscaped garden with pergola for comfortable shade and a pool area with space for 8 pool beds.
The partly refurbished (2013) terraced house is 190+ sqm over two floors. Upper floor with a brand new kitchen, a large roof terrace, spacious living room area with
column51:
Villa Mariposa is our dream project. After searching for both the right area and then the right house - we found Villa Mariposa in febuary 2013. The house was in bad shape but we saw the potential.

We planned the renovation with an architect from Barcelona and finished the first renovation phase for the summer of 2013 - and we will continue with more renovation projects along with time.

We travel a lot - New York, Sydney, Europe, Asia - and over the years we have come to places where we have found special details or fantastic ambience or great views. These "moments" have been the inspiration for Villa Mariposa. Spacious, not to much furniture, a garden garden that tells a story over the year - and a view that takes the breath away.

column43: BEAUTY Apartment views First Sea Line with Parking
column44:
Spacious apartment (Awesome location) with terrace just in front of the beach with direct sea views. 1 Bedroom with 4 beds, 1 MainRoom bedroom and Living room with sofa bed for 2. Fully equipped apartment, very bright and cozy with private parking.

column51:
Soy nacido en el EmpordÃ , en la poblaciÃ³n de Palafrugell, y actualmente tengo 42 aÃ±os.

Vivo en La Bisbal d'EmpordÃ , con Silvia, mi compaÃ±era y con Mel, Maui y Bruno, nuestras mascotas.

Me licenciÃ© en Derecho en el aÃ±o 2000 pero nunca he ejercido la profesiÃ³n; seguramente, porquÃ© prefiero la tranquilidad de la vida en mi tierra que teÃ±ir mi existencia con las tensiones de los Tribunales ( no estoy hecho para esto ).

En Airbnb anunciamos casas de la familia ( 2 casas en Canet de La Tallada y dos apartamentos en Palau-Sator ) y tambiÃ©n otra casa cuyos derechos de explotaciÃ³n he adquirido ( Sant Iscle d'EmpordÃ  ).

El proyecto inicial de las casas de Canet de la Tallada era la venta pero la depresiÃ³n del sector inmobiliario hizo a la familia cambiar de opiniÃ³n y decidimos su explotaciÃ³n en modo de arrendamiento. AdemÃ¡s, cuando no estÃ¡n alquiladas las usamos la familia ( somos 5 hermanos ).

En Palau-Sator, los apartamentos que tienen origen en la rehabilitaciÃ³n de la casa de mis abuelos paternos. Era una casa muy grande y hace ya mÃ¡s de 15 aÃ±os la familia tomÃ³ la decisiÃ³n de restaurara en este sentido.

DespuÃ©s de 3 aÃ±os en la plataforma, mi experiencia como anfitriÃ³n con Airbnb es francamente buena. Salvo pequeÃ±os detalles y algÃºn caso aislado estamos muy contentos con los huÃ©spedes que nos han llegado.

Recomiendo el EmpordÃ  de forma enÃ©rgica, cualquiera de sus rincones, espacios, paisajes o playas...Esta regiÃ³n, es muchÃ­simo mÃ¡s que el conocido TriÃ¡ngulo de Oro. Os lo aseguro!! 

AquÃ­, puedes relajarte, divertirte, ir de fiesta, en globo, practicar equitaciÃ³n, bajar en canoa por el rÃ­o Ter, alquilar un velero, ir en bici, jugar a Golf o Picht&Putt, practicar nudismo, baÃ±arte en calas preciosas o, si lo prefieres, en playas kilomÃ©tricas, perderte en largos paseos al atarceder y comerte un buen arroz!!

We are Ana and KristjÃ n and weâve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Letâs Holidays.

The passion with which weâve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us.

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you.

column43: Rustic apartment near beaches and golf courses
column44:
Located at the characteristic medieval village of Palau-Sator, this renovated apartment offers you a comfortable residency during your holidays. The living room, dining room, and kitchen merge into a single open-plan space, painted in warm tones and filled with light. Totally furnished, the living room area is fitted out with two sofas, a coffee table and, for your entertainment, a flat screen TV and Wi-Fi service.
The apartment offers also two bedrooms and one bathroom.

The space
This specific location, which is setteld in a very quiet medieval village is an exceptional catalan

Guest access
The apartment has no public areas. All spaces, interior and exterior, are strictly for private use. Wifi.

Other things to note
As for the tourist accommodation tax, upon arrival, you will be charged the amount of â¬ 0.45 / per person over 16 years / night (up to 7 nights).

Minimum 7 nights from Saturday to Saturday
column51:
Soy nacido en el EmpordÃ , en la poblaciÃ³n de Palafrugell, y actualmente tengo 42 aÃ±os.

Vivo en La Bisbal d'EmpordÃ , con Silvia, mi compaÃ±era y con Mel, Maui y Bruno, nuestras mascotas.

Me licenciÃ© en Derecho en el aÃ±o 2000 pero nunca he ejercido la profesiÃ³n; seguramente, porquÃ© prefiero la tranquilidad de la vida en mi tierra que teÃ±ir mi existencia con las tensiones de los Tribunales ( no estoy hecho para esto ).

En Airbnb anunciamos casas de la familia ( 2 casas en Canet de La Tallada y dos apartamentos en Palau-Sator ) y tambiÃ©n otra casa cuyos derechos de explotaciÃ³n he adquirido ( Sant Iscle d'EmpordÃ  ).

El proyecto inicial de las casas de Canet de la Tallada era la venta pero la depresiÃ³n del sector inmobiliario hizo a la familia cambiar de opiniÃ³n y decidimos su explotaciÃ³n en modo de arrendamiento. AdemÃ¡s, cuando no estÃ¡n alquiladas las usamos la familia ( somos 5 hermanos ).

En Palau-Sator, los apartamentos que tienen origen en la rehabilitaciÃ³n de la casa de mis abuelos paternos. Era una casa muy grande y hace ya mÃ¡s de 15 aÃ±os la familia tomÃ³ la decisiÃ³n de restaurara en este sentido.

DespuÃ©s de 3 aÃ±os en la plataforma, mi experiencia como anfitriÃ³n con Airbnb es francamente buena. Salvo pequeÃ±os detalles y algÃºn caso aislado estamos muy contentos con los huÃ©spedes que nos han llegado.

Recomiendo el EmpordÃ  de forma enÃ©rgica, cualquiera de sus rincones, espacios, paisajes o playas...Esta regiÃ³n, es muchÃ­simo mÃ¡s que el conocido TriÃ¡ngulo de Oro. Os lo aseguro!! 

AquÃ­, puedes relajarte, divertirte, ir de fiesta, en globo, practicar equitaciÃ³n, bajar en canoa por el rÃ­o Ter, alquilar un velero, ir en bici, jugar a Golf o Picht&Putt, practicar nudismo, baÃ±arte en calas preciosas o, si lo prefieres, en playas kilomÃ©tricas, perderte en largos paseos al atarceder y comerte un buen arroz!!

column43: Begur Villa with pool and sea view
column44:
This single-storey villa in Begur has a large sunny and private garden with pool, sea view and Wifi Internet. Three bedrooms, two bathrooms, private parking and a beautiful and quiet location.

The space
This single-storey villa has a large sunny and private garden - great for the kids to run around in with plenty of room for games and the pool - which has a special Baby-Secure safety fence. All the bedrooms have french doors opening out onto the garden and with great views across the valley of Sa Riera and the Mediterranean Sea. There is a large garden table and chairs for dining on the shady terrace and 6 pool chairs for comfortable sunbathing as well as a barbecue.

The kitchen is equipped with the necessary modern appliances: fridge-freezer, dish washer, gas stove with extractor hood, electric oven and microwave. The kitchen opens out onto the terrace making it ideal for alfresco meals.

RURAL HOUSE IN CCan Ginesta (Tramuntana) is a rural house that offers all the comforts to rest and to know the region.
The house is distributed on two floors. On the first floor there is the kitchen, fully equipped, the dining room, the living room, a room with a double bed and a bathroom.
This room communicates with an ample porch for exclusive use.
On the upper floor there are the other two bedrooms, one with a double bed that has a large sun terrace, and another with two single beds, to which two extra beds can be added. All rooms have their own bathroom.

Sant Feliu de Boada, has a privileged situation, since it offers the tranquility of a small rural town, and at the same time allows in 10 minutes to be located in any of the most beautiful coves and beaches of the Costa Brava, as well as the main towns of the region as La Bisbal, PalamÃ³s, Torroella de MontgrÃ­, Palafrugell, Begur, Pals, Peratallada ...

column43: Beautiful old farmhouse with pool II  (PG-502)
column44:
Mas Vinyoles is at the same time away from it all and close to everything: Beach, mountains, beautiful cities like Girona, Barcelona, Figueres.... After a full and busy day it is wonderfull to retire to it's unique quietness.

The space
Mas Vinyoles is a Catalan countryside house that is partly converted to offer a pleasant space to spend your holidays: 2 fully equipped apartments, for 4 and 6 people.
There is a garden with a swimming pool and bbq, a biological vegetable garden and an orchard.
We are in the heart of the protected area â³Les Gavarres â³, a series of hills of Mediterranean forest between Girona and Costa Brava.
This is a place to spend some quiet days of rest, exploring the surroundings by foot or on bicycle.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the swimming pool (sea salt water), a beautiful garden surrounding the house, tons of hills with cork trees, silence, bird songs and clean sky with outstanding stars.
column51: I live in "Les Gavarres" since 1985 and I love it. To take care of the forest and the wild life has become an important project of my life. I am happy to realise that every year a new variety of birds discover that this is a good place for them to spend at least part of the year.

column43: Charming Apartment. Sea views. Pool. Pkg. 6 people
column44:
Cozy and cute apartment with fireplace. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, fits 6 people. Very sunny, with a balcony overlooking at sea views and pine trees. 20 m to big swimming pool. Parking included. Situated at 800m of el Golfet, one of the most beautiful beaches of Costa Brava with amazing crystal water. The area is very quiet and relaxing area through an exceptionally beautiful path along the coastline that will take you to the centre of Calella in 25-30 min walk. Going by car is less than 3 minutes

The space
Ideal place for families with children that want to enjoy the beauty of Costa Brava but want a quite and relaxing place.

Surrounded by truly Mediterranean vegetation, all rooms overlook at pine trees, cypress and other trees, with views of the sea from the balcony. This community was awarded with the well-known architectural design FAD awards, with a very good distribution that allows space for six people for a medium-size apartment. Beautiful kitche
column51:
I live close to Barcelona and spend my weekends in this apartment. During summer I love travelling with my family and this is why I rent it. I always go to apartments and love to have advices from places to visit or recommendations on restaurants so I am very pleased to do the same with my guests. 

I love travelling with my family and showing my kids the beauty of learning different cultures, learning few words from new languages and making friends from other cultures. Few years ago I lived in London for a couple of years and I have great memories of that time. 

I also love painting, and the apartment has some of my collection on the walls. I also love dancing salsa and all type of music too. Recently I've just started Kundalini yoga which I love too. Next to the apartment there is a beach, el Golfet, which is an amazing place to meditate in the morning with the rising sun. That's unbeliveable!

I love sharing my apartment with my guests and feel extremely happy when they are experiencing the 'good vibes' it transmits.

Costabravaforrent Masramon is a beautiful villa with its own private swimming pool of 6x3, with views of the MontgrÃ­ Park and 900 metres from the beach.

The space
Costabravaforrent Masramon is a beautiful villa with its own private swimming pool of 6x3, with views of the MontgrÃ­ Park and 900 metres from the beach.

It consists of a suite and four double bedrooms, two with double beds, one with two single beds and one with two bunk beds. column51:
Hello! I'm Ismael and this is my wife Oksana. We are young family which like to travel, active sports, music, beach and enjoying the life...  Bending with people from different countries and cultures is one of our passions, cause we are international family ;)
We are sociable, outgoing, friendly, hospitable and we love good conversation.
We love Lloret de Mar with great beaches, good food, wine and friendly people. We invite you to come here - a beautiful Mediterranean city. We want that you enjoy your vacations. The space

column51:
Twenty five years ago we wanted to buy a house in France for our holidays and we found Le Coustal. We restored first the old farmhouse dated 1870 and this is the place we used to live in ourselves. Now this beautiful  farmhouse is also for rent and we named it La Ferme.  We ourselves moved to ChÃ¢teau Preyssac in Thenon,  which we are renovating right now.  We started to restore all the other buildings on the domaine. Many years later we could buy the land of our neighbors and we were able to completely renovate the Maison de Maitre and opening it for guests six years ago. 
We are originally from the Netherlands, however 16 years ago we moved from Holland to the United Arab Emirates with our daughter Sanne. 
Nowadays I spend my time between France and the Emirates and together with my daughter Sanne and a dedicated team we take care of our guests in France and Spain, where we also have a family property ( las Rocas) hosted by my cousin Gijb.
Apart from las Rocas we now manage 3 more properties in Rosas: 
Belleza del Mar, Casa Diaz, and Casa Flamenco. 
in the future we hope to add some more treehouses at the domaine Lalande-Laborie. At the moment there are two and maybe in the future in the forests of Preyssac !!

The Riells blau apartments are located around 700m to the beach of Riells. The apartment complex has a large communal pool located in beautiful gardens with both plenty of sun and shade. The apartment complex is ideal for children as there is a childrens play area.
Our apartment is on the first floor and overlooks the pool. It consists of two bedrooms with double beds, and one bedroom with twin beds. A fully fitted open style kitchen with oven, electric hob, fridge/freezer, dishwasher and microwave. There is a separate shower room and utility room with washing machine.
The lounge and diner are combined and have a set of patio doors which open onto a large terrace/balcony which overlooks the communal gardens and to sit and watch the kids in the pool while enjoying a glass of wine in the shade! There is communal WiFi and Local TV and CD player, In the lounge there is a big sofa and easy chair to comfortably sit 6 people.
This is a large roomy apartment that sleeps 6

The space
The ForÃ§a street is the most special street of Gironaâs old quarter. It was the neuralgic center of the old Jewish Quarter and during the Roman period this street was part of the Via Augusta. We are Ana and KristjÃ n and weâve been offering accommodation in Tossa de Mar for over thirty years. Seven years ago, we were very happy to found Letâs Holidays.

The passion with which weâve been working these past years has made us grow, and we now have a vast team of professionals working with us. 
With them, we will make sure to find the best option for you and to get you everything you will need during your stay :)

If there is something that we have learnt this past years is that we like to be treated the same way that we treat you.

Letâs Holidays Home will be your second holiday home. A place where you will be able to meet with our Hosts, chat, have a glass of wine and listen to some live music.
