column43: Pretty Villa in Spectacular Setting with pool
column44:
A countryside haven with in easy reach of the shimmering Costa Brava. Situated within the national park of Les Gavarres, aside a picturesque, medieval village, the villa has breathtaking views and spectacular walks. Enjoy traditional features with modern comforts, pool, garden & donkey.

The space
The situation is idyllic and unique. I don't think there is any other property in the area that can boast such a tranquil setting and be in walking distance of 2 of the best and affordable countryside restaurants in the area. To be by such a pretty but quite medieval village while in a national park is pretty amazing. The house is not "Ikead" it has taste, character and charm. The garden in beautifully planted and the pool at 11m, a perfect size. It really is a fantastic base to explore the medieval villages of Emporda, the beaches of the Costa Brava and the whole of Catalonia in general with the mountains, Girona, France and Barcelona also just a day trip away.

The space

- the top floor has the master bedroom, a bathroom with bath, a lounge area with âwalk-inâ closets and a separate terrace with sea view

column43: Sleep & Stay deluxe aptmt old town
column44:
Make your visit to Girona memorable staying in this fantastic deluxe apartment that is overlooking the main square of the town hall, Placa del Vi and on walking distance of all shops, restaurants and Jewish quarter.

We are looking forward hosting you in our beautiful medieval city!

The space
The apartment is beautifully decorated, with a spacious open dining, kitchen and living room with a super relaxing modern seating area featuring windows and balconies that overlook one of the main squares of the old town, Barri Vell.
The kitchen is recently renovated with all appliances needed and has plenty of kitchen wear. There's a Dolce Gusto coffee machine, oven, microwave, dishwasher, air-con and washing machine. In the living room there is a sofa bed for an extra 3rd and 4th guest.
There is one spacious double bedroom with a kingsize bed (160x200m) and lots of wardrobe space. The mattress is off a high quality, purchased in 2021 We provide high
column51:
Sleep and Stay is a professional holiday rental agency and licensed Real estate Agency.
All our properties are carefully selected and we prioritize customer service, a personal touch and impecable cleaning. We leave a welcome package with cleaning products (dishwasher tablets, laundry tablets, sponge, cloth and extra garbage bags) and first essentials like coffee, tea, sugar, salt, pepper, olive oil and vinegar. Those items you just need for a couple of days away, are just great to have at your disposal. 
Most people that visit Girona once, never want to leave again. They want to come back, because Girona has it all. We recently opened a branch in Besalu which is small medieval copy of Girona. We have beaches, culture of Dali, the great Spanish kitchen with lotâs of different tapas and wines, old medieval villages and mountains great for skiing, hiking and cycling! What else do you want?

Thatâs why we fell in love with Girona and made it our business of helping people to find their dream holiday home for a weekâs stay or even to buy a property and have a second home in this amazing region! Sleep & Stay is owned by Jolien Huizing Gerrans, Dutch nationality, and she has surrounded herself by an amazing team. Sonia (Polish) and Luis (Honduras). We personally manage each holiday property that are featured on this website and are experts in the Girona property market for more than 4 years. We all speak next to our mother tongues Spanish, Catalan and English which makes all language barriers disappear!

As a young and dynamic holiday rental organisation, specialised in amazing holiday rentals, property management and property finder services. We can assist you in finding a special place to stay in Girona. We value quality, comfort and well maintained holiday rentals as our most important goals. We want to find that charming place for you that makes you fall in love with Girona too and makes you want to stay forever.

Once you arrive and you need anything, we are here to help you. Available on (Hidden by Airbnb) , email and we're just a phone call away. Welcome to come and stay with us!

column44:
Three bedroom apartment, lovingly renovated in Spanish vintage style. Fantastic location near the old town, yet peaceful river view. There are two double bedrooms, one with an extra single bed. The third bedroom has a single bed which can be folded & used as secure bike storage. Cosy in winter, but shaded in summer. Perfect for large families, two couples sharing & cyclists. English speaking host gives you a personal welcome.
Fully registered with the Catalan authorities as a holiday apartment.

The space

A living room with balcony to give space to relax, whilst the kitchen & bathroom are attractive & modern. Free, fast wifi is available for your entertainment devices & there is a TV for local programming.

column51: My family and I moved to Catalonia from the UK 20 years ago, finding Can Torras two years later. Since then it has been a labour of love to renovate two apartments and my old farmhouse. I knew from the start this was where I wanted to live - the food, the scenery, the wonderful weather. Now I'm pleased to share the farmhouse, my garden and its magnificent views with visitors and offer my apartments in Girona for self catering stays. I am happy to share my experiences so that visitors enjoy the best that Catalonia has to offer.

column43: Peaceful location, 900m to beach, upper floor
column44:
It's the upper apartment in our house, with a lovely terrace that gives you a nice view of the Bay of Roses.

Located at the beginning of a hill that is close to the town center and to the beach (easily within walking distance), yet peaceful. Supermarkets are roughly 600m away, beach 900m and the central bus station 500m.

The space
The apartment is meant for 4, but a foldable bed is available to make room for 5. There is another, smaller apartment downstairs that is also available for rent, should you require more space.

Guest access
A small barbecue grill is on the balcony, and there is a big stone grill downstairs that might be used together with the tenants downstairs.

Other things to note
Satellite TV over Astra is available, though admittedly the receiver is set to German channels. The other stations are further back.

column44:
Apartment in a quiet street in the center of Sant Antoni de Calonge, 50 meters from beach

100 m2 arranged to accommodate up to 8 people (5 beds and a double sofa bed)

Suitable for persons on wheelchair: on street level, with wide corridors and doorways

3 bedrooms (2 double, 1 with bunk bed)
2 bathrooms with shower
Living room with 1 double sofa bed
Satellite TV, Internet WiFi
Private parking for 1 car

The space
Sant Antoni combines a rich medieval history with modern day facilities, offering an ideal place to relax, either on the beach or in the mountains. It lies 2 km away from PalamÃ³s, along the seashore path, offering the visitor exceptional views of our coasts.

The beautiful winding path along the "Camino de Ronda", will also take you to Playa de Aro. During the walk, you will be able to sit down and rest on any of the terraces and enjoy the sunshine, even during the winter months.

In
column51:
Hello,

We are a family who own a number of apartments and houses
-  Costa Brava, Spain (town of Sant Antoni de Calonge and town of Palamos)

We speak fluent English, French, Danish, Spanish, Catalan, German and Mandarin Chinese.

My father is a diplomat, so we have lived and traveled extensively around the world. We enjoy meeting travelers and try our best to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.

We have contracted cleaning and maintenance staff, available to solve any issue that may come up during your stay, as soon as possible.

Generally Ana (in Spain) will be the ones to meet you at the property and provide tips about the area (she can advise on activities, restaurants, shops...). 

We enjoy good food and wine, sailing (and may be able to take you out on a boat trip locally depending on the dates of your visit), scuba diving, skiing, go-karting, adventure sports in general, entrepreneurial ventures, football, art and architecture, handicrafts etc.

column44:
In the heart of old CadaquÃ©s, between the sea, 100 meters away, and Santa Maria Church, with its baroque altarpiece 23 m high, this family house can accommodate up to 10 people. Built on two floors, it has a large patio where between sun and shade you can have lunch and take a nap. On the second floor, a bay window overlooking the Riba Pitxot with its famous arcade painted by Dali, Picasso and many other painters who made CadaquÃ©s their place of inspiration.

The space
This is an old house bought by my family in the 1950s when fresh water arrived by tanker. The current kitchen is installed in the old cistern. We tried to maintain the house in its original appearance by equipping it with a kitchen and modern bathrooms.

Guest access
The house is entirely up to you.

Other things to note
It is not possible to reach the house directly by car.
We advise you to park at Port-Alguer while you carry your luggage inside.

Our wonderful rustic "Mas" farmhouse full of character in the quiet and serene Gavarres Nature Park/Baix Emporda between Palamos and Mont Ras near Palafrugell and Calella... far from the maddening crowd but just a stone's throw away from the beaches of Castell, La Fosca, Cala Estreta, etc on the Costa Brava.
Fully furnished & equipped by default, for 13 GUESTS.
However there is room, if necessary, for 2 more guests for an extra guest fee.

License # HUTG-017243

The space
Mas CabrÃ© is a typical Catalan "mas" (farmhouse) built in 1842, according to the date chiseled on the front stone archway. However, it's been documented that a building of some kind already stood there in the 15th century. That's not surprising, since human presence in the area dates from prehistoric times and several dolmens and other Megalithic carvings can be found on the property or close to it.

column43: Sleep & Stay Duplex apt in Old Town
column44:
Cozy city apartment, divided over two levels with one bedroom. Beautifully decorated, to make you feel at home in Girona straight away! Located close to the Sant Feliu church in Calle Barca.

The space
Cozy city apartment, divided over two levels with one bedroom. Beautifully decorated, to make you feel at home in Girona straight away! Located close to the Sant Feliu church in Calle Barca.

This beautifully apartment is located on the third floor. The apartment has high ceilings and has a bright and spacious living space on the first level. There is an open kitchen, with an open bar to the big dining table suitable for 6 guests. There is a sleeping sofa for an extra 2 guests and a cot available on demand. On the second level there is a bathroom with a bath, a little office area and main bedroom. This bedroom is not on the main street side, so a nice and quit room for a good nights rest after a long day in Gironaâs old town!

Guest access
column51:
Sleep and Stay is a professional holiday rental agency and licensed Real estate Agency.
All our properties are carefully selected and we prioritize customer service, a personal touch and impecable cleaning. We leave a welcome package with cleaning products (dishwasher tablets, laundry tablets, sponge, cloth and extra garbage bags) and first essentials like coffee, tea, sugar, salt, pepper, olive oil and vinegar. Those items you just need for a couple of days away, are just great to have at your disposal. 
Most people that visit Girona once, never want to leave again. They want to come back, because Girona has it all. We recently opened a branch in Besalu which is small medieval copy of Girona. We have beaches, culture of Dali, the great Spanish kitchen with lotâs of different tapas and wines, old medieval villages and mountains great for skiing, hiking and cycling! What else do you want?

Thatâs why we fell in love with Girona and made it our business of helping people to find their dream holiday home for a weekâs stay or even to buy a property and have a second home in this amazing region! Sleep & Stay is owned by Jolien Huizing Gerrans, Dutch nationality, and she has surrounded herself by an amazing team. Sonia (Polish) and Luis (Honduras). We personally manage each holiday property that are featured on this website and are experts in the Girona property market for more than 4 years. We all speak next to our mother tongues Spanish, Catalan and English which makes all language barriers disappear!

As a young and dynamic holiday rental organisation, specialised in amazing holiday rentals, property management and property finder services. We can assist you in finding a special place to stay in Girona. We value quality, comfort and well maintained holiday rentals as our most important goals. We want to find that charming place for you that makes you fall in love with Girona too and makes you want to stay forever.

Once you arrive and you need anything, we are here to help you. Available on (Hidden by Airbnb) , email and we're just a phone call away. Welcome to come and stay with us!

column43: Beautiful apartment in the old town
column44:
Completely renovated respecting the original design of the spaces , the apartment perfectly combines the comfort and luxury of modernity with the charm of the old items .

The space
Spacious , comfortable, quiet and with a special charm, this apartment is located in a traditional building of the old town of Girona . Completely refurbished to offer all the comforts of today's architecture and design, has a modern kitchen, two bathrooms and two fully equipped rooms.

The hydraulic mosaic floors , its high ceilings , the classic woodwork doors and windows, provide all the spaces special warmth and personality.

Both the master bedroom which has its own bathroom , and the double room have natural light. The first and the living room have large windows that open onto a balcony above the Rambla .
